oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Vern Gosdin Publicity Photo
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Guitar; Musical instruments; Gosdin, Vern;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white half-length portrait of Vern Gosdin seated with a guitar. The photo was released by Columbia Records. Crossed out at the bottom of the photo is a handwritten note that says, "7 1/4 x 8," presumably in reference to the size of the metal photoplate. To view a poster that features the metal photoplate made from this photo, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/24022.
